title: Will the iPhone 12 support 5G? When will it launch? - Quora

response.answer_text: yes bud Iphone 12 is gonna support 5g   and about the launch date its still not confirmed it was supposed to be announced on the apple launch event held a few days ago but they didn't so i guess we will have to wait a bit longer but one things for sure they are definitely gonna be worth the wait!

All iPhone 12 models may come with a 5G connectivity but it is also said that only one model of iPhone 12 may support the fastest internet connectivity i.e the 5G connectivity and the rest may come with 4G connectivity only. The model that may come with the 5G connectivity is the iPhone 12 pro models. It is heard that iPhone 12 may be launched in late September or first week of October.
